brokers.title: Broker Connections
brokers.description: Automatically sync your trades from your broker
brokers.noConnectionsDescription: Connect your broker to automatically import your trades
brokers.connectBrokerDescription: Enter your API credentials to connect your broker account
brokers.createAccountDescription: Create a new account to link with your broker connection
brokers.apiKeyHelp: You can generate your API keys in your Tradovate account settings. Make sure you have the 'API Access' add-on enabled.
brokers.flexQueryIdHelp: This is the numeric ID found next to your Query Name in IBKR (e.g., 1234567).
brokers.ibkrStep1: Log in to IBKR Account Management
brokers.ibkrStep2: Go to Reports ‚Üí Flex Queries ‚Üí Trade Confirmation Flex Query ‚Üí Create
brokers.ibkrStep3: Configure the query with all trade fields and note the Query ID
brokers.ibkrStep4: Go to Settings ‚Üí Flex Web Service and generate a token
brokers.ibkrTutorialTitle: üìñ How to get your IBKR credentials?

ibkrTutorial.step1Title: Log in to the IBKR portal
ibkrTutorial.step1Desc: Access your Interactive Brokers account via the Client Portal.
ibkrTutorial.step2Desc: In the main menu, go to: Performance & Reports ‚Üí Flex Queries
ibkrTutorial.step3Desc: Click the '+' button next to 'Activity Flex Query' to create a new query.
ibkrTutorial.step3Item2: Give your query a name (e.g., 'Trading Path Journal Sync')
ibkrTutorial.step3Warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: Select 'Activity Flex Query', NOT 'Trade Confirmation'. Activity Query allows historical data (up to 365 days).
ibkrTutorial.step4Desc: Set the output format and date range:
ibkrTutorial.step4Period: Period: Last 365 Days | Date Format: yyyy-MM-dd | Time Format: HH:mm:ss
ibkrTutorial.step5Desc: In the 'Sections' panel, you MUST enable the Trades section:
ibkrTutorial.step5Critical: Without checking 'Trades', no trade data will be exported!
ibkrTutorial.step6Desc: Click on the 'Trades' section to expand it, then select these fields:
ibkrTutorial.step6DateTimeNote: MUST include time for accurate ordering
ibkrTutorial.step7Title: Save and note the Query ID
ibkrTutorial.step7Desc: After saving, IBKR will assign you a unique Query ID number.
ibkrTutorial.step7Note: Copy the Query ID exactly as shown. It's the number next to your Query Name.
ibkrTutorial.step8Desc: Go to: Settings ‚Üí User Settings ‚Üí Flex Web Service
ibkrTutorial.step9Desc: Click 'Generate Token' to create your API access key.
ibkrTutorial.step9Warning: The token is only displayed once! Copy it immediately.

cgv.title: Terms of Sale
cgv.description: These terms of sale govern the use of Trading Path Journal's paid services.

article1.title: Article 1 - Purpose
article1.content: These Terms of Sale define the rights and obligations of the parties in the context of the online sale of services offered by Trading Path Journal.

article2.title: Article 2 - Pricing
article2.content: The prices of our services are indicated in euros, including all taxes. Trading Path Journal reserves the right to modify its prices at any time, it being understood that the price displayed at the time of order will be the only one applicable to the Customer.

article3.title: Article 3 - Payment
article3.content: Payment is due immediately upon order. The Customer can make payment by credit card. Payments made by the Customer will only be considered final after actual receipt of the amounts due.

article4.title: Article 4 - Subscriptions
article4.content: Subscriptions are concluded for the duration chosen by the Customer (monthly, quarterly, semi-annual or annual). They are automatically renewed at the end of each period, unless cancelled by the Customer before the due date.

article5.title: Article 5 - Right of withdrawal
article5.content: In accordance with Article L221-28 of the Consumer Code, the right of withdrawal cannot be exercised for contracts for the supply of digital content not provided on a tangible medium whose execution has begun with the consumer's agreement.

article6.title: Article 6 - Termination
article6.content: The Customer can terminate their subscription at any time from their personal space. Termination takes effect at the end of the current subscription period.

article7.title: Article 7 - Liability
article7.content: Trading Path Journal cannot be held responsible for direct or indirect damages caused to the Customer or third parties due to the use of the services. The tool is provided for informational purposes and does not constitute investment advice.

article8.title: Article 8 - Applicable law
article8.content: These Terms of Sale are governed by French law. In case of dispute, French courts will have sole jurisdiction.

cgv.questionsText: Questions about our terms of sale?

cgu.title: Terms of Use
cgu.description: These terms of use govern access to and use of the Trading Path Journal website.

article1.title: Article 1 - Acceptance of terms
article1.content: Access to and use of the Trading Path Journal website are subject to acceptance and compliance with these Terms of Use. By using the site, you unreservedly accept these terms.

article2.title: Article 2 - Description of services
article2.content: Trading Path Journal is a web application allowing users to track and analyze their trading performance. The service includes trade import, journal management, statistics display and other related features.

article3.title: Article 3 - Registration
article3.content: Use of the services requires creating an account. The user agrees to provide accurate information and maintain the confidentiality of their credentials. They are responsible for all activities carried out from their account.

article4.title: Article 4 - Personal data
article4.content: Trading Path Journal collects and processes personal data in accordance with GDPR. Imported trading data remains the property of the user and can be deleted at any time from the personal space.

article5.title: Article 5 - Intellectual property
article5.content: All elements of the Trading Path Journal website (texts, graphics, software, etc.) are protected by intellectual property law. Any reproduction or representation, in whole or in part, is prohibited without prior authorization.

article6.title: Article 6 - User conduct
article6.content: The user agrees to use the service in accordance with its intended purpose. It is forbidden to attempt unauthorized access to systems, disrupt the service's operation or use it for illegal purposes.

article7.title: Article 7 - Risk warning
article7.content: Trading involves significant risks of capital loss. Trading Path Journal is a tracking tool and does not provide any investment advice. Trading decisions remain the sole responsibility of the user.

article8.title: Article 8 - Modification of terms
article8.content: Trading Path Journal reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Users will be informed of significant changes. Continued use of the service after modification constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

cgu.questionsText: Questions about our terms of use?

mentions.title: Legal Notice
mentions.description: Mandatory legal information concerning the Trading Path Journal website.

editor.title: Website editor
editor.name: Trading Path Journal
editor.address: 39 Chemin des Fins Nord, 74000 Annecy, France

director.title: Publication director
director.content: The publication director is the legal representative of the sole proprietorship.

intellectual.title: Intellectual property
intellectual.content: All content on the Trading Path Journal website (texts, images, videos, logos, etc.) is protected by copyright. Any reproduction or representation, in whole or in part, of the site or any of its elements, without express authorization, is prohibited.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: The site uses essential cookies for the application to function (session, user preferences). No advertising cookies are used. By continuing to browse, you accept the use of these cookies.

gdpr.title: Data protection (GDPR)
gdpr.content: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify, delete and port your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us at the address indicated above.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.content: Subscription prices (Monthly ‚Ç¨10, Quarterly ‚Ç¨20, Biannual ‚Ç¨50, Annual ‚Ç¨70) are subject to change. Active subscriptions keep their current rate until the next renewal. All prices include VAT.

mentions.questionsText: Questions or requests regarding your personal data?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

dataCollection.title: Data collected
dataCollection.content:
We collect the following data:
‚Ä¢ Account information: email, Discord username (optional)
‚Ä¢ Trading data: imported trades, statistics, personal notes
‚Ä¢ Technical data: IP address, browser type, connection logs
‚Ä¢ Payment data: processed by Stripe (we do not store your card information)

dataUsage.title: Data usage
dataUsage.content:
Your data is used to:
‚Ä¢ Provide and improve our trading journal services
‚Ä¢ Calculate your statistics and performance metrics
‚Ä¢ Authenticate and secure your account
‚Ä¢ Process your subscription payments
‚Ä¢ Send you important communications (updates, security)
‚Ä¢ Improve our service through feedback and anonymized analytics

dataStorage.title: Storage and security
dataStorage.content:
Your data is stored securely:
‚Ä¢ Database hosted by Supabase (AWS EU - Frankfurt)
‚Ä¢ Encryption in transit (TLS) and at rest
‚Ä¢ Secure authentication with JWT tokens
‚Ä¢ Data access limited to what is strictly necessary
‚Ä¢ Regular automatic backups

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content:
We only use essential cookies:
‚Ä¢ Session cookie: maintains your login
‚Ä¢ Language preference cookie: remembers your FR/EN choice
‚Ä¢ No advertising or third-party tracking cookies
‚Ä¢ No selling of data to third parties

thirdParties.title: Third-party services
thirdParties.content:
We use the following third-party services:
‚Ä¢ Supabase: authentication and database
‚Ä¢ Stripe: payment processing
‚Ä¢ OpenAI: AI Coach feature (anonymized data)
‚Ä¢ OVH: server hosting

Each service complies with GDPR and has its own privacy policies.

rights.title: Your rights (GDPR)
rights.content:
Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
‚Ä¢ Right of access: obtain a copy of your data
‚Ä¢ Right to rectification: correct inaccurate data
‚Ä¢ Right to erasure: delete your account and data
‚Ä¢ Right to data portability: export your data
‚Ä¢ Right to object: refuse certain processing

To exercise these rights, go to Settings > Account or contact us.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.content:
For any questions regarding your personal data:

Email: contact@tradingpathjournal.com
Address: 39 Chemin des Fins Nord, 74000 Annecy, France

Data Protection Officer: contact@tradingpathjournal.com

pricing.faq2Question: What happens after the free trial?
pricing.faq2Answer: If you don't want to continue, cancel before the 7 days are up. Otherwise, your card will be automatically charged according to your chosen plan.
